title: Lunar Revel Diana
body:
Hi everyone my name is Stamporion. I was just wondering if this skin for Diana could have a little color change in the abilities. Dark Valkyrie Diana's changes are so big that I personally think it is better, while Lunar Revel Diana's color is a very light pink, almost the same as the white. Just wondering if their could be a bit more pink in there, darken it up or something alike.

Thank you!

replies.body:
Hey Stamporion,

Thanks for taking the team to leave feedback regarding content! 

While I agree that there are some slight similarities between Base Diana and Lunar Goddess Diana, I think all of her skins have their own thematics.

The Lunar Goddess Diana was a skin made for the Lunar Revel event, which is is why it has a cherry blossom/floral accents in all of her skills. This is something her base doesn't have, and it's something Dark Valkyrie doesn't have either, because the thematic isn't as light hearted. 

For now, we don't have plans to change the color of Lunar Revel Diana.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=nhyploG1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-01T16:25:16.459+0000)
>
> Hey Stamporion,
> 
> Thanks for taking the team to leave feedback regarding content! 
> 
> While I agree that there are some slight similarities between Base Diana and Lunar Goddess Diana, I think all of her skins have their own thematics.
> 
> The Lunar Goddess Diana was a skin made for the Lunar Revel event, which is is why it has a cherry blossom/floral accents in all of her skills. This is something her base doesn't have, and it's something Dark Valkyrie doesn't have either, because the thematic isn't as light hearted. 
> 
> For now, we don't have plans to change the color of Lunar Revel Diana.

Just my personal suggestion... It might be a nice candidate for a chroma. Would love it with more pink and maybe a different hair color (like blonde or magenta)
I'd agree with that. She has a soft color particle set that would work well with various outfits.

Hey kateykhaos, is riot planning on using the cinese arts for some skins? i know they did this about a year ago but is it possible if there was another batch? i saw annie in wonderland's chinese splash and wow i would buy it if it had that splash!:) same with most of poppy's skins and jannas 2 oldest skins. tempest and hextech i think its called?

I love Diana and own them both so I totally agree with this. They are 975 skins, yet you can hardly notice a difference in any skin. However, the color change in Dark Valkyrie is more noticeable. Lunar Goddess looks pretty much the same as the base skin. So if she's not going to get a new, good skin, at least spice up the old ones to be worth 975.
